Study Design The study design prospective , interventional , parallel , triple blind , randomize , control clinical trial aim assess clinical outcome full-mouth ultrasonic debridement combine clarithromycin amoxicillin + metronidazole association treatment generalize aggressive periodontitis ( GAgP ) . The study approve Institute Science Technology 's ( ICT - State University São Paulo ) Ethics Committee ( protocol 1.079.307 ) . Source data The population study recruit among patient refer Science Technology Institute - ICT- São José do Campos , College Dentistry . Patients fill healthy history questionnaire ensure medically qualified participate study . Based power calculation study , 44 subject divide two group need achieve 80 % power detect 0.8 mm difference clinical attachment level ( CAL ) patient . Clinical Parameters All clinical parameter assess single blind , train calibrated examiner ( CFA ) periodontal therapy ( baseline ) 3 6 month use manual probe . Measurements do six site per tooth ( mesiobuccal , buccal , disto-buccal , distolingual , lingual , mesiolingual ) teeth , except third molar . The following clinical parameter evaluate : 1 ) Full-mouth plaque index ( FMPI ) ; 2 ) Bleeding probe ( BoP ) ; 3 ) Probing depth ( PD ) : distance bottom sulcus/pocket gingival margin ; 4 ) Gingival recession ( GM ) : distance free gingival margin cement-enamel junction ( CEJ ) ; 5 ) Clinical attachment level ( CAL ) : distance bottom sulcus/pocket CEJ . The CEJ identify careful probe cervical area . Calibration Randomization Initially , total ten patient present GAgP select . Treatment Protocols All patient treat periodontal therapy one-stage , full mouth , ultrasonic debridement ( FMUD ) . In single session , patient receive local anesthesia periodontal debridement ultrasound equipment ( Cavitron - Dentsply EUA ) subgingival tip ( UI25KSF10S , Hu-Friedy ) . All diseased site instrument one session . The debridement session perform single experienced train periodontist ( MPS ) , different examiner . Amoxicillin ( AMX ) + metronidazole ( MET ) group ( n = 22 ) : FMUD + ( AMX 500 mg tid + MET 400 mg tid , 7 day . All patient start take pill immediately FMUD session .
